SELECT p.id,p.dynasty,p.author,p.poem_content,p.poemcol,COUNT(DISTINCT rr.id) as readNum ,COUNT(DISTINCT lc.id) as likeNum ,COUNT(DISTINCT rrc.id) as readCommentNum FROM poem as p LEFT JOIN read_record as rr on p.id=rr.poem_id LEFT JOIN likes_collect as lc on p.id=lc.poem_id and lc.type=#{1} LEFT JOIN read_record_comment rrc ON rrc.read_record_id=rr.id WHERE p.author LIKE CONCAT('%',#{0},'%') GROUP BY p.id

SELECT p.id,p.dynasty,p.author,p.poem_content,p.poemcol,COUNT(DISTINCT rr.id) as readNum ,COUNT(DISTINCT lc.id) as likeNum ,COUNT(DISTINCT rrc.id) as readCommentNum ,pt.poem_type_name ,pt.id as poem_type_id FROM poem as p LEFT JOIN read_record as rr on p.id=rr.poem_id LEFT JOIN likes_collect as lc on p.id=lc.poem_id and lc.type="点赞" LEFT JOIN read_record_comment rrc ON rrc.read_record_id=rr.id LEFT JOIN poem_poem_type ptt on p.id=ptt.poem_id LEFT JOIN poem_type pt ON pt.id=ptt.poem_type_id WHERE pt.id=#{0} GROUP BY p.id
